RealPaperBear.name: Twitch Subs
RealPaperBear.desc:
A resource that is consumed by certain skills
- Clash Win: Gain 400 Twitch Subs
- Clash Lose: Gain 800 Twitch Subs
- On Kill: Gain 1500 Twitch Subs

MDcFaBa.name: Gloves - Skill 1
MDcFaBa.desc:
- A Resource that is spent by certain skills
- Increase Min Speed by 1 for every value on self
- Deal +7% more damage for every value on self
- Max Value: 4

MDcFaBb.name: Gloves - Skill 2
MDcFaBb.desc:
- A Resource that is spent by certain skills
- Gain 2 Offense Level Up next turn for every value on self (Max 6)
- Deal +7% more damage for every value on self
- Max Value: 4

MDcFaBd.name: Gloves - Skill 3
MDcFaBd.desc:
- A Resource that is spent by certain skills
- Gain 1 Protection next turn for every value on self (Max 3)
- Deal +10% more damage for value on self
- Max Value: 4

BloodArmor.name: Armadura de Sangre
BloodArmor.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Stage 1 Armadura de Sangre
- Used for special Skills

BloodArmor_2nd.name: Armadura de Sangre II
BloodArmor_2nd.desc:
- Max Value: 20
- Stage 2 Armadura de Sangre
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Offense Level and 1 Defense Level for every 5 value on self
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- Used for special Skills

BloodArmor_3rd.name: Armadura de Sangre III
BloodArmor_3rd.desc:
- Max Value: 40
- Stage 3 Armadura de Sangre
- Turn Start: Gain 2 Offense Level and 2 Defense Level for every 5 value on self
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Damage Up for every 15 value on self
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 2
- Used for special Skills

ElectricShock.name: Gambler's Falacy
ElectricShock.desc:
A resource used by certain skills
- Whenever this unit loses SP, increases by the amount of SP lost
- Clash Win: Increase value by 5
- Clash Lose: Lower value by 5
- For every 10 Value, the minimum this unit rolls on all ranges increases by 1 (Max 5)
- Max Value: 90
